result.name: Whole genome resequencing of important Bos indicus breeds from Pakistan
result.description: Whole genome resequencing of Bos.indicus from Pakistan is a project of identifying sequencing based genome wide variations across the important B.indicus breeds of Pakistan. It is a collaborative project between NIBGE, Pakistan and BGI Shenzhen and is started in 2014. The project is supervised by Shahid Mansoor from NIBGE Pakistan and XinLiu from BGI Shenzhen.
